channel.title: Run error plz help
channel.description:
Hey its me again and unfortunately I have an error when I run my source :( Here it is:
Devolution Server 7.0 - Created by Winten/Bakatool ------------------------------------------------------- Loading npcs... drops... Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatExcept ion: For input string: "50 3140 1 0.7 //King black dragon" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at NPCHandler.loadNPCDrops(NPCHandler.java:1200) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:426) at server.main(server.java:97)
ok so I know its in my npchandler that theres missing something but what and were do I put it?

item.title: Run error plz help
item.dc:creator: @Darkness_Pk Darkness Pk
item.description:
@Darkness_Pk wrote:

You shouldn’t put drops in there. There is a TuT in the tut section.

Read full topic

item.title: Run error plz help
item.dc:creator: @i0wnuall i0wnuall
item.description:
@i0wnuall wrote:

Okay post your NPC drop for Kbd.

Read full topic

item.title: Run error plz help
item.dc:creator: @zofis7 zofis7
item.description:
@zofis7 wrote:

Thank you very much I have no more errors but now when I kill the npc in game I get no drop and I put in like 10

Read full topic

item.title: Run error plz help
item.dc:creator: @Darkness_Pk Darkness Pk
item.description:
@Darkness_Pk wrote:

In your npc drops

“50 3140 1 0.7 //King black dragon” There is a space here, don’t use spaces use TABS

Read full topic
